Articles.Content: MY GAME CRASHIN WHEN I WAS EXIT SOACE CENTER OR MENU ETC. ITS CRASHED 4 TIMES AND I BORED PLS GIX THIS OR GIVE MY MONEY BACK!!!!!

On 4/4/2021 at 9:08 AM, Merdan said:

MY GAME CRASHIN WHEN I WAS EXIT SOACE CENTER OR MENU ETC. ITS CRASHED 4 TIMES AND I BORED PLS GIX THIS OR GIVE MY MONEY BACK!!!!!

What were you doing before it crashed? Was the game dealing with a high part-count vessel?

I build a lot of high part count vessels and it’s not uncommon for the game to stop when they are under intense physics loads like re-entry or crashing.
